item.title: Writing readable LINQ code in C#
item.description: As a software developer, writing self-explanatory code is a skill that most agree is required but everyone seems to have differing views on the level of code simplicity. In this post, I am sharing my views on how I write readable LINQ code.

item.title: CWE-316 storing secure strings in .NET SecureString
item.description: How to resolve CWE-316 in .NET using SecureString in a neat and easy way.

item.title: Running .NET Core on Windows Subsystem for Linux
item.description: Build .NET Core apps on Windows, run it on Windows Subsystem for Linux.
